replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
查了一下MCP

MC 1.12: net/minecraft/entity/Entity.isOnSameTeam
Name: r => func_184191_r => isOnSameTeam
Descriptor: (Lnet/minecraft/entity/Entity;)Z
Comment: Returns whether this Entity is on the same team as the given Entity.
Side: BOTH
AT: public net.minecraft.entity.Entity func_184191_r(Lnet/minecraft/entity/Entity;)Z # isOnSameTeam复制代码
你试试删除地图文件夹内的data文件夹内的scoreboard.dat看看？

嗯呢，没有
https://github.com/P3pp3rF1y/Reliquary/issues/355
找了半天，发现是新版本forge导致的问题，目前正在解决中
你有两个解决方法
1.删除圣遗物mod
2.降级forge到2776版本
